# HUD::SET_MINIMAP_COMPONENT

## Summary
Sets a component on the minimap on/off - returns false if component is not valid

## Parameters
* **eMINIMAP_COMPONENT** componentId
* **BOOL** onOff
* **HUD_COLOURS** color = -1

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This native is used to colorize certain map components like the army base at the top of the map.
p2 appears to be always -1. If p2 is -1 then native wouldn't change the color. See https://gfycat.com/SkinnyPinkChupacabra
